name: macOS Big Sur 11.2.1, macOS Catalina 10.15.7 Supplemental Update, macOS Mojave 10.14.6 Security Update 2021-002
available: macOS Big Sur 11.2, macOS Catalina 10.15.7, and macOS Mojave 10.14.6

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: ABC Research s.r.o. working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

cves.credit: ABC Research s.r.o. working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur 11.2, macOS Catalina 10.15.7, macOS Mojave 10.14.6
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by updating to sudo version 1.9.5p2.
advisories.note: After installing this update, the build number for macOS Catalina 10.15.7 is 19H524.
